trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Appleton
There were no other sightings in Appleton on or around August 8th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas sitting in my hot tub with a friend. I noticed around 10pm two bright lights moving across the sky in tandem. At first I thought the light was a satellite before I observed the rear light. The object moved across the Big Dipper that gave us some perspective of the size. It appeared cigar shaped and moved at a slow rate across the sky. The lights were non pulsating. I grabbed my cell phone and attempted to record the event. But the recording was too dark. We lost sight of the object after passing over the house. My friend and I were in awe of the event that took place.
Summary: Observed very large object heading east in Appleton Wisconsin. Object had 2 lights, one on the front and back.
